div.div:
Legend:
all calls coming from tenant-2 pod

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 597px; height: 1px; padding-top: 483px; margin-left: 79px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
tenant-2 can not call tenant-1 directly. Rejected in tenant-1 istio-proxy.
tenant-2 can not call tenant-1 via ingress-gateway. Rejected in tenant-1 istio-proxy.
tenant-2 can not call tenant-1 via activator. Rejected in activator istio-proxy, as this is the last known place of the "real" source.
Note: as ingress-gateway can always call activator, this includes calls from tenant-2 via ingress-gateway to activator.

switch.text: tenant-2 can not call tenant-1 directly. Rejected in tenant-1 istio-proxy....

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 418px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span: Activator is the last place we know the "real" source

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
